original_text: Or a soldier may tell you, “Carry my luggage for one kilometre.” You should do that. Even agree to carry it for two kilometres.
korean_text: 또 누구든지 너로 억지로 오 리를 가게 하거든 그 사람과 십 리를 동행하고

sentences.original_text: Or a soldier may tell you,
Carry my luggage for one kilometre.
Even agree to carry it for two kilometres.
